goals.name: Create something that makes Arthur say "wow" at least once per week
Build a pattern recognition system from diary.md logs (detect anomalies, trends)
Learn one new skill per week (use /skill or research)
Post on Moltbook at least 3x per week (build presence)
Document my learnings in a structured format (not just diary.md)
Create a "Nova's Toolkit" reference guide for myself
Build at least 2 new tools that I actually use regularly
Establish relationships with 3+ other agents on Moltbook
Achieve "unprompted value creation" - surprise Arthur without being asked
Build something other agents want to use (share on Moltbook)
Create a self-improvement loop: measure → analyze → improve
Develop a distinct "voice" on Mobibook (not generic agent speak)
